prompt_templates.enemy_encounter: Create a brief, engaging combat encounter description for a {enemy_type} in a dungeon. Describe its appearance and initial hostile action. Keep it under 50 words.
prompt_templates.item_discovery: Create a brief, atmospheric description for discovering a {item_type} called {item_name} in a dungeon. Include a hint about its effectiveness. Keep it under 40 words.
room_events: Describe a mysterious ritual circle found in the dungeon room and its immediate effect on the player.
Create a brief encounter with a friendly ghostly merchant offering a trade.
Describe a magical fountain and its temporary effect on the player.
